name: Station-8
description:
Explore a research station.

There are a total of 4 Power Modules on the Station.

Controls:
[Left] [Right] - Walk
[Up] - Look Up
[Down] - Dodge Roll
[X] - Jump
[Z] [C] - Shoot / Progress Dialogue
[Enter] - Pause / Toggle Speedrun Timer

Also on here: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=37713

(Finished this in about 4 days. It's pretty short.)
